strings.Value: ...tried to jam the doors, to deactivate the trap!
...decided not to push our luck and retreated.
...surged forward, paying no heed to the dangers surrounding us!

"Break... all break bad..." We turned around and saw a kobold, sitting on the ground beside a broken lever. The kobold was holding his head in his hands, but sensing us, he jumped up.
"Ssstop! You go — you fall! All go — all fall... Sssorrow, sssorrow..." He grew woeful, and lamenting he skittered down one of the passages. Then we...
Using equal parts wisdom and dexterity, we jammed the ominous hatch. Now we could proceed without fear. Thus the darkness of the yawning abyss was roundly defeated!

Our journey into the mysterious dungeon brought us by twists and turns to an old mine. A huge hatch in the floor blocked our way! Its panels were half-open and squeaked angrily, threatening to plunge careless adventurers into the abyss below. It stretched from wall to wall, making it impossible to simply walk around this deadly trap.

Much as we hated to admit it, the crafty designs of the kobold trap-masters proved too much for our efforts. After attempting to jam the panels shut, we bravely stepped forward... heard a terrible squeak... and plummeted into the darkness!
At first the panels seemed to hold our weight. But one careless step later, and they swung wide open — and we plummeted down into the darkness below!
